title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: There are two Revert options in the popup menu.
EB: There should only be one Revert option in the popup menu.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Right-click on any item to open the popup menu.
3. Look for the Revert option and notice that it appears twice.
